description:
doc: update wiki article to use html/template properly.

Fixes issue 3569.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d282c379aad7 ***

doc: update wiki article to use html/template properly.

Fixes issue 3569.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6116055

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/6116055/diff/5001/doc/articles/wiki/index.html File doc/articles/wiki/index.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6116055/diff/5001/doc/articles/wiki/index.html#newcode401 doc/articles/wiki/index.html:401: the HTML formatter before outputting it, which escapes HTML On 2012/04/26 07:44:11, r wrote: > The html/template package helps guarantee that only safe and > correct-looking HTML is generated by template actions. For instance, it > automatically escapes any greater than sign (>), replacing it > with >, to make sure user data does not corrupt the form > HTML. Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6116055/diff/5001/doc/articles/wiki/index.html File doc/articles/wiki/index.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6116055/diff/5001/doc/articles/wiki/index.html#newcode401 doc/articles/wiki/index.html:401: the HTML formatter before outputting it, which escapes HTML The html/template package helps guarantee that only safe and correct-looking HTML is generated by template actions. For instance, it automatically escapes any greater than sign (>), replacing it with >, to make sure user data does not corrupt the form HTML.

subject: code review 6116055: doc: update wiki article to use html/template properly.
